name: The Rabbit Hole (itch)
description:
You find yourself being lost in the pastel street and an unkown presence is robbing you of your beloved toy rabbit. You choose to enter the maze of houses to find it but you are not alone. 

Controls: 

View: Mouse / Right Joystick

Move: WASD / Right Joystick

Sprint: Left Shift / Right Trigger

Pickup Item: Left Mouse Button / Left Trigger

This game was created as part of the Global Game Jam of the univeristy Bayreuth. 

Tim Keil (Twitter /  Artstation ) - Game Design | Programming | Level Design | Technical Art 

Emily Panzer (Instagram  / Artstation) - 3D / 2D Art | Level Design

Ralph Mönius (Instagram) - Programming | Game Design 

Tim Schneider (Instagram) - Sound Design | SFX |  Game Design 

Eric Etterer (Instagram) - 3D Art | Technincal Art 

Music Credits: 

Song: "Sometimes, When You fall, You Fly" created by Nihilore 

Link: http://www.nihilore.com/jpop  License: http://www.nihilore.com/license

Song: "Within the Shadows" created by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio 

Link: https://karlcasey.bandcamp.com/album/dusk-till-dawn
